body.name: AZDOME 5G WiFi 3 Channel Car Dash Cam, 1440P+1080P+1080P Front and Rear Inside Dashcam for Car, Free 64GB Card, 3.19" IPS Screen Driving Recorder Built-in GPS WDR IR Night Vision, 24H Parking Mode
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 4 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 4 mins
features: Built-in 5G WiFi: AZDOME M550 Pro 3 channel dash cam 2024 new design with 5GHz WiFi. 5.8GHz transmission speed is 4~6 times that of 2.4GHz. 5.8GHz WiFi allows user to download 800Mb video within 10 seconds.
3 Channel Dash Cam: 1. Front: 4K (3840x2160P); 2. Front and rear: 4K+1080P; 3. Front and inside: 1440P+1080P; 4. Front and rear inside: 1440P+1080P+1080P.
Please Format at 1st Time Using: AZDOME M550 Pro car camera offer user free 64GB SD card. Please format SD card at first time.

Built-in GPS: AZDOME GPS Player could display vehicles speed, route, latitude and longitude. M550 Pro dashcam provides evidence during emergencies. 3 channel dash cam front and rear inside could completely record the driving route data.

IR Night Vision: M550 Pro car camera delivers super night vision. Dash camera backs with Novatek 8629G Processor, SC401AI, GC2053 and SC223A sensor. Night vision dash cam could clearly record day and night evironment.

24H Parking Mode: AZDOME M550 Pro driving recorder provides 2 parking modes: 1. Collision detection parking mode, G-sensor could detect collision and lock the video. 2. Time-lapse parking mode, dash cam could record continuously for 24 hours.

Warranty: AZDOME M550 Pro triple dash cam provides 12 months warranty and 24*7 technical supports. Please email us when you facing to any problems with aftersales service. AZDOME R&D team will try our best to feedback within 24 hours working days.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AZDOME M550 Pro 4K Car Dash Cam - Your Car Companion Using the M550pro driving recorder is a good partner for your driving records! Its advanced features, including 4K resolution, F1.8 aperture, six glass lenses and powered by MS8629G Processor and a best-in-class SC401AI & GC2053 & SC223A Powered by an ultra-low-light capture sensor, including Super Night Vision, it ensures clear footage day and night, accurately showing road signs and license plates. No matter where you are, this dash cam provides high-definition video recording, making it a reliable witness of any event. Please choose M550pro dash cam without hesitation because of its practicality, convenience and excellent performance. Kind tips: The package contains a 64GB Micro SD memory card. Maximum support for 256GB Micro SD card. Be sure to format your microSD card when using your dashcam for the first time. It is recommended to format the memory card every two weeks, which can prolong the service life of the card. Even if you don't, the dashcam will still record just fine because it has a loop recording feature. ✔ Uses a Class 10, U3 speed Micro-SD card. We recommend SAMSUNG Class 10, U3 speed Micro-SD cards. Or, use the Micro-SD card we recommend specifically for dash cams, and get a 128GB TF card by searching for ASIN: B09K78CNM8. ✘ Do not use any Micro SD cards from third-party sellers. We have no way of knowing what performance other manufacturers' SD cards have, they may not be designed for this high-end 4K HD dash cam.

4K & Three Channel Dash Cam Front and rear 3-way cameras 1440P+1080P+1080P. Experience new levels of 3840x2160p 4K UHD video recording powered by MS8629G Processor and a best-in-class SC401AI & GC2053 & SC223A ultra-low light capture sensors. The ultra-wide-angle lens can achieve a 150° field of view, easily covering four lanes, and driving safely and securely.

High-end performance dash cam Its advanced features include 4K resolution, F1.8 aperture, six glass lenses, equipped with MS8629G Processor and a best-in-class SC401AI & GC2053 & SC223A, including super night vision, 24-hour parking monitoring (connect the 3-Lead Hardwire Kit ), all-round protection of your driving.

Built-in 5GHz Wi-Fi and GPS Experience the convenience of the AZDOME M550 Pro 3CH dash cam's advanced 5GHz Wi-Fi. Connect your phone, use the free AZDOME app to access and download clips, and easily share memorable trips on social media. GPS accurately records vehicle position, speed and route, providing a comprehensive overview. Easily access this valuable information from your smartphone or computer, which will provide favorable evidence in the event of an unexpected accident

M550 Pro Dash Cam M300S Dash Cam M301 Dash Cam M330 Dash Cam M27 Dash Cam Video Resolution Front 4K+Rear 1080P,1440P+1440P+1080P Three Way Front 4K+Rear 1080P Front 2K+Rear 720P Front 1080P FHD Front 2K FHD Camera Type 3 Channel Front inside Rear 2 Channel Front and Rear 2 Channel Front and Rear Front Front Screen Size 3.19 Inch N/A N/A 0.96 Inch 3 Inch Storage Info 64GB 64GB 64GB N/A N/A Support SD Card 256GB Max 256GB Max 128GB Max 128GB Max 128GB Max Smart Voice Control ✘ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✘ Wi-Fi ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Parking Monitor ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ G-Sensor & Loop Recording ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really crispy clean video quality
reviews.reviewText: Excellent camera quality, the 4k on this is a very big plus, it looks so beautiful and clear when I replay the videos on my computer. I use it for road trips really and i enjoy rewatching the videos because of the crisp clean video quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There’s much to like about the size of this dashcam, it’s best feature. It is slim, inconspicuous, and the direct adhesive mount system is great - compared to the suction cups. Features are ok, not a lot of advanced technology in terms of audio, frame capture rates, etc. it works and for $99, a decent option. But I only use this for front facing and the occasional cabin view. That being the case - there are other options and better ones at the sub $100 price - eg from Rove. But the trade off is size - for more features and better technology. Of note - this dashcam is restricted to 4K when only the front camera is used. Once other cameras are used - the resolution drops. If you’re using front and rear - two cameras sub $50 offering 4K resolution is another option.However - the biggest letdown here is the flaky wifi. I’m on my 2nd unit and on the verge of sending it back unless I can figure out the randomness of the wifi working, not working, desire to be in 2 or 5 GHz mode.IMO - not very stable, there are better options. But the form factor is great - it’s biggest advantage - but may not outweigh the down sides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The AZDOME 5G WiFi Dash Cam is a high-end automotive accessory. Offering 4K front and dual 1K rear recording, the video quality is exceptional, particularly with its night vision capabilities. The built-in GPS and 24-hour parking mode are useful features for safety and monitoring. The inclusion of a 64GB TF card is a thoughtful addition. Its intuitive interface makes it user-friendly, though installation might require some technical know-how.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth - Don't waste money on AZDOME
reviews.reviewText: Please don't go by the people's reviews on YouTube. Most of them have exaggerated the conditions and situations.1. The dash cam becomes so hot in the winter that it shuts down on its own. Not good if you are parking the car in the sun2. The new model M550 Pro has an issue with the software/firmware. Reboot several times for what not reasons. It restarted 30 times in 30 minutes.3. The inner camera with a C-type attachment flickers so hard that the dash cam reboots very frequently due to an error4. The dash cam doesn't work when both the inner and back cameras are connected. So 3 channels fail to work in the M550 Pro model5. The WIFI fails to connect and the dash cam reboots. I was not able to connect to WIFI as it rebooted every time I tried to connect6. Observed that GPS signals are feeble compared to an older model that my friend has7. The video had all sorts of noise, more than expected. Not sure how bad it sounds after driving8. The clarity on the back camera is really bad compared to an older model9. You need to install a hardware kit for parking mode to work. Without a hardware kit, it is just a toy10. There is no battery in the dashcam. Once you turn off the car the dash cam will shut down. If you use a hardware kit, that drains your car battery.Totally it was a waste of time, effort and money. Finally had to return this China product.Amazon sent me a PIN to receive the package which says it is a high-value product. Currently, initiated for a return with a refund. I will update this review on how the return works and the time taken to refund the amount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars AZDOME M550 Pro 3 Channel 4K Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: The AZDOME M550 Pro 3 Channel 4K Dash Cam is an excellent choice for those who prioritize high-quality video recording. The three-channel setup ensures comprehensive coverage of the road ahead and behind, giving you peace of mind while driving. Its 4K resolution ensures crystal-clear footage, making it worth the investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Electromagnetic installationCons:None so farRequires some extra wiring if your 12V outlet does not auto shutoffThis comes with a couple of electromagnetic pieces of plastic that adhere to your window without any glue and is surprisingly strong. You just wash and dry your window, place the plastic on the window and then stick the mount's double sided tape onto the plastic. If you want to move it you can slide the plastic around and easily take the plastic off without leaving behind residue or any kind of tape mess. I was impressed at how easy that was.You want your dash cam to automatically turn on when you turn on the car. If your 12V outlet is connected to your ignition then you simply plug in the usb cord to the included 12V car charger. My Ford Fusion is wired this way. My older Volkswagen Eurovan is not though. For my VW I would have to remember to unplug the dash cam and re-plug it in every time I drive. That's prone to forgetfulness. So I bought a fuse tap and wired a new 12V USB outlet to a fuse on my fuse box that is wired to the ignition switch. For me that was my car seat heaters. Alternatively, you can buy a Hardwire kit that will monitor your battery and turn off if the battery is low, that will also provide 24 hour recording - even when your car is turned off. I am not taking off any stars for this, as it is standard on every dash cam I have bought and really depends on what kind of car you have.The camera provides a very clear image and the inward facing camera can be easily disconnected if you don't want to record your passengers. My wife prefers not to have a camera pointing right at her face, so I'm glad that I could remove the inward facing camera. But that extra camera would be great for someone driving an Uber to record the passenger's activities. It can also catch a bit of what is happening out the side windows.I was happy to see that it came with a 64GB SD card. It's reassuring that this package comes with everything you need.
